summary: CAR STALLS WHILE DRIVING.  SEEMS MORE PREVALENT WHEN BACKING UP, TURNING A CORNER OR SLOWING DOWN, YET HAS ALSO HAPPENED AT HIGH SPEEDS ON FREEWAY.  WHEN IT STALLS, THE STEERING WHEEL LOCKS, AND DOES NOT GAIN CONTROL UNTIL THE CAR IS RESTARTED.  ALMOST $1000 OF REPAIRS TO TRY AND FIX THE PROBLEM.
